devdoc.author: Peeramid Labs, 2024
devdoc.details: This contract implements the IDistribution and CodeIndexer interfaces. It uses the Clones library for address cloning.

params.distributor: The address of the entity that performed the distribution.
params.instances: An array of addresses that were produced.

constructor.details: Retrieves contract addresses from a contract index using the provided identifiers      and initializes the distribution system.

params.RankifyDIistributionId: Identifier for the Rankify distribution implementation
params.accessManagerId: Identifier for the access manager implementation
params.beneficiary: Address that receives payments and fees
params.distributionVersion: Semantic version information as LibSemver.Version struct
params.governanceERC20BaseId: Identifier for the governance token implementation
params.paymentToken: Address of the token used for payments in the system
params.rankTokenCodeId: Identifier for the rank token implementation in CodeIndex
params.trustedForwarder: Address of the trusted forwarder for meta-transactions (WARNING: Not yet reviewed)

distributionSchema().details: This is only needed to ensure `DistributorArguments` are provided in ABI, as it would be internal otherwise.

returns._0: DistributorArguments The schema of the distribution.

returns.sources: An array of addresses that are used for instantiation.

instantiate(bytes).details: `instances` array contents: DAO, GovernanceToken, Gov Token AccessManager, Rankify Diamond, 8x Rankify Diamond facets, RankTokenAccessManager, RankToken

params.data: The initialization data for the new instance, typeof {DistributorArguments}.

returns.distributionName: A bytes32 value representing the name of the distribution.
returns.distributionVersion: A uint256 value representing the version of the distribution.
returns.instances: An array of addresses representing the new instances.

devdoc.title: MAODistribution

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with the provided parameters and performs necessary checks.

distributionSchema().notice: Returns the schema of the distribution.

instantiate(bytes).notice: Instantiates a new instance with the provided data.

userdoc.notice: The contract is responsible for creating and managing DAOs and Rankify distributions.
